mapper.select:
select board_no, board_title, board_content, board_hits, board_group, board_orderno, board_depth, board_date, board_state, boardlist_no, member_no,
(select member_name from member where board.member_no = member.member_no) as name
from board
where board_state = 1 and boardlist_no = #{boardlist_no } order by board_no desc
